metadata.title: CVE-2020-12407 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla Developer Nicolas Silva found that when using WebRender, Firefoxwould under certain conditions leak arbitrary GPU memory to the visiblescreen. The leaked memory content was visible to the user, but notobservable from web content. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 77.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
